report.title: Occurrence images for boundary
report.description: Outputs a list of occurrence images filtered to the contents of a boundary.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM occurrences o JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id AND oi.deleted=false JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #joins# WHERE o.deleted = FALSE AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND st_intersects(s.geom, ST_MakeValid(st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) AND (#sref_max_size#=-1 OR #sref_max_size# >= CASE WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osgb' THEN CASE WHEN length(s.entered_sref)=5 THEN 2000 ELSE power(10, (6-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) END WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osie' THEN power(10, (5-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) ELSE 1 END) AND #website_filter# #idlist# #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, oi.path, oi.caption, s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, cttl.id as taxa_taxon_list_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, cttl.default_common_name as common, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as species, cttl.taxon_group as taxon_group, st_astext(s.geom) as geom, CASE WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osgb' THEN CASE WHEN length(s.entered_sref)=5 THEN 2000 ELSE power(10, (6-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) END WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osie' THEN power(10, (5-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) ELSE 1 END as sref_size, length(s.entered_sref) / 24.0 as fillopacity, length(s.entered_sref) / 3 as strokewidth, o.zero_abundance

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: sref_max_size
param.display: Max size of a grid ref
param.description: Enter the maximimum size of a grid reference in metres, e.g. 1000 for a 1km grid ref. Leaf blank for no grid ref size filter.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report
